website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for a mid-calf boot. They are warm and cozy and tend to run a bit small.
pros: Warm and cozy boots that are comfortable, fashionable, and easy to put on
Owners appreciate that the soft, lightweight design can be worn indoors or out
cons: A few customers experienced quality issues over a long duration, including frayed linings, diminished sole quality, and  buttons falling off

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw addict
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Bearpaw boots. My first ones were bought from an actual retailer and these came in the exact same packaging as my others. Even down to the shoe box inserts. They're super comfy and soft. I feel like this will become my new collection/addiction! Here are the ones I got in charcoal. Don't mind the odd angle of my legs haha
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are my 1st pair of Bear Paws, recommended by my daughter. They came securely packaged. I order a 9....I usually wear an 8.5 however I live in Northern Michigan and want room if I need to add winter socks. I had a similar pair from Cabelas that lasted through 2 puppies & several years. I always spray water repellant stuff on my boots to make them easier to clean. I like these boots instead of winter slippers...I don't have to wear socks with them....they are great for quickly getting on/off, doing errands, letting pups out, getting firewood, getting the mail, etc. I especially love wearing with leggings. Super comfy! We will see how they do this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got my blue Bearpaw in, came in earlier than expected, packaged well. Brand new in the box great quality. The buttons are not just for looks they do function so that you can fold your boots down. I wear a size 8 and ordered a size 8 they are snug, but it's recommended that you order your normal size as they do stretch a bit. I have been walking around the house in them for a few hours and they are starting to get a bit looser. Definitely a good investment as I won't need to buy more boots for a few winters.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: They are great
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying and I love them .. Super comfy
customer_reviews.author: Jan13

customer_reviews.title: Cutest and most comfy boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin, these boots are so cute and comfy. This is the second pair I have purchased. I have previously bought the black pair, so I went with hickory this time and they are my new favorite. The color is gorgeous and will go with all sorts of outfits. I do personally think they run a bit big though. I normally wear a 9, and ordered a 9 and they are just a bit big, but not a deal breaker. Leaves room for thick, warm socks! If you're on the fence about these boots, just go ahead and make the leap and get them. You can not beat the quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Garner

customer_reviews.title: I definitely glad I bought them
customer_reviews.text: I definitely glad I bought them, really keep my feet warm and they are good quality (someone told me he "liked my Uggs"). I work from home and use them to work in inside. I normally wear a 7 1/2 and I bought a 7 1/2. Felt a bit tight at the toe at first but the inside flattened a bit and now, after a couple weeks of use, they feel like the right size. I think that if I had bought an 8, they might have eventually gotten a bit floppy.
customer_reviews.author: NTG

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! These are so stinking cute and comfortable! I wear an 8 1/2 or 9 depending on the shoe, but these days I wear a 9 more often. I bought the size 9 and the fit is perfect. I can go with slim socks or a thicker sock and my foot will be fine. They’re super cozy warm and they look great. I have wide calf‘s, so the part of my leg which enters the boot is 12.5 inches diameter and I still have room.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Ugg boot look but for a faction of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots for anyone with extra wide calfs and thicker ankles. Also they are very warm, so I don't normally wear mine with any socks. Even in our cold Wisconsin winter, they keep my feet nice and toasty. I definitely recommend stain/waterproof spraying them before wearing them. Comfertable footbed and I have high arches so comfort is a must! Great buy for anyone wanting that Ugg boot look without the pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: 1love1life

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of Uggs for almost 10 years before my puppy chewed them up. I really didn't want to spend $100+ on a new pair of Uggs, so I thought I would give BearPaw a try. I'm so glad I did. I love wearing these. They are comparable to my Uggs in comfort and warmth. I don't know if they will last quite as long, but for the price, I think even if I get 2 or 3 years of wear out of them, it will definitely be worth it. I am very pleased with this purchase and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I’m getting addicted to bearpaw boots!
customer_reviews.text: This is now my second pair of this style/brand of boots I have the tan pair and now the black ones. They are my favorite boots to wear in winter, w/these boots they aren’t water proof so spend the $10 for the boot spray to help protect them from rain. These boots fit exactly like they should so if you wear a 8 get a 8. I like my boots to be tight not loose so if you want a loose feel go a half size up. Only thing that sucks is shoes are different prices for different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie_105

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart- didn't even last the winter
customer_reviews.text: Extreamly dissapointed that after only a few months of wear these expensive boots completely fell apart. I loved them at first, super cozy. But they wore put in less than three montns (did not even last the winter) the sole on the bottom of the boot cracked for seemingly no reason so they get wet evertime they are worn in snow/water. Im wondering if they have a guarantee or replacwment policy. Would love to get more, but not when they are destroyed so easily. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I have a larger-than-normal calf so finding boots that fit comfortably is a difficult process
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I was looking for! With the season coming to an end I was having a really hard time finding a pair of short to mid sized boots that were black with buttons on the side. I have a larger-than-normal calf so finding boots that fit comfortably is a difficult process, so the buttons are a good compromise. I was looking at multiples stores locally and online with no price limit in place and I still couldn't find what I was looking for until I stumbled across these Bearpaw ones. They're easy to throw on, buttoned or not buttoned, very comfortable and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite style
customer_reviews.text: Out of all the Bearpaw boots, this is my favorite style and color. I especially like the opening is wide so it is easy to slip into the boots. My first pair lasted for a good four-winters and was still in good shape except the back sole was worn out and rocks would get stuck inside and make weird noises when I walk so I had to throw that pair out. This is my second pair and I still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Z Li

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very wide. I had a huge gap at the top, and it looked like I was wearing a bulky oversized shoe. I normally wear 7.5, and that's what I ordered. I found them to be larger than the average 7.5, and it was hard to walk in them. My foot was sliding all around the boot, and I found the entire boot too large. I will add that they are soft, and the grey color is nice, but I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Clouds for your feet
customer_reviews.text: These run a little big and wide, which I personally love. These are my absolute favorite boots- I’ve got two pair now. I just replaced my first pair after 18 months of near daily wear. They are not water proof, wear accordingly! But they are SO comfy inside, I feel like I’m wearing slippers everywhere! If it’s super cold, they’re not going to keep you completely warm, but they do pretty good in 30ish degree weather. If it gets too cold I’ll put a pair of fuzzy socks on too, and that makes it super toasty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the best. Especially since I have neuropathy in my feet
customer_reviews.text: I was so glad I found these in your site. I bought a pair about 10 years ago. I wear them a lot in the fall and winter. My cat decided to use them as a cat box. I was crushed. But now I have my new pair!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Delores Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and great value
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous boot, perfect fit, the 8.5 size I ordered couldn't fit any better, with enough toe box area for a heavy sock, very pleased with this purchase. A great value for the price, just as described, I ordered gray and it is as the pictures showed.
customer_reviews.author: lakehouseplayer

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up if you want to wear thick socks!
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm! I usually wear size 7 and I ordered a 7, but I feel like I would have been better off with a 7.5 or even a 8, so that I can actually wear thick socks. These boots fit me perfectly, but I do have to wear thin socks. My feet are still warm though, so no complaints about that. Overall I liked them and for that price, it was ideal!
customer_reviews.author: Vidi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I already own 3 pairs of Bearpaw boots. This pair did not meet my expectations when I opened the box. I do not like that the boots are shaped differently. One is more round while the other has sort of a round square shape. I know its not obvious if you quickly glance. But i see it, so it bothers me a little. Also on the right side of the right foot it looks as if the material was not glued in properly so that is irritating me a little bit. I love Bearpaws. This unfortunately was my worst pair. Might have to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the seller!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolutely disappointed! I ordered a pair of black bearpaw boots in a size 10, which is one size bigger than what I normally wear. They were still way too small. I absolutely loved the look of them & was hoping to exchange for a bigger size. The sellers refused to allow me to exchange, but did offer a refund. Very frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: YMS

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are very well made, fit as expected, true to size and can endure whatever the winter gives... The city I live in gets really cold and we get plenty of snow during the winter months. These are my go to boots, I jump right into them without even wearing any socks and my feet are always kept nice, warm and dry. I never slip or slide when walking in the snow. They look similar to the other more expensive boots on the market for about 1/3 of the cost...I would highly recommend buying these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J

customer_reviews.title: A pair of must-have-boots!
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave reviews often but I just received my boots & I absolutely LOVE them. I am usually a size 6 but I got a 7 because I know the inside covered with sheepskin lining so to give myself some additional room I ordered up & it was a great idea! I got Hickory and its perfect tone of brown to go with jeans or any color or leggings. I may buy some of the other colors also!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these! We were in a cabin in southeast Alaska with un-insulated and un-heated floors so my feet were like ice all day and took forever to warm after going to bed. These have cured that problem. I live in these now even in civilization! I will wear a thin (these get tight with regular socks) pair of wool socks inside them if I'm outside or the day is extra old. I forgot I was wearing them when I was frying food and got a grease spot on one of them so I'm bummed but still wear them. They also need to be treated to be water repellent before wearing them outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: they were a bit heavy on my feet (more so than other boots I've had like them). My major complaint is the quality of ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots, as Bearpaw boots always are. However, they were a bit heavy on my feet (more so than other boots I've had like them). My major complaint is the quality of the boots. My mom has bought pairs of these in the past, and they have all lasted 5+ years. This pair lasted two seasons, and by the third seasons I had my feet cold and/or soaked every time. Feels as though the quality is not as good as it once was.
customer_reviews.author: Erol

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my wife and she loves them. It’s been about a year now and they have not worn out in anyway and they still look great. We sprayed some waterproofing on them which has really done well for her in the rain! I recommend this boot to others!
customer_reviews.author: AtheyMts

customer_reviews.title: I just had to replace my old pair
customer_reviews.text: My father bought my first pair and I wore it for 5 solid years. I had to use staple pins to hold them together when they came apart. This drove me to buy the exact same pair. I do hope they last as long as my old ones. They were delivered in a timely manner. They are comfy, they keep my toes warm and toasty and I just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy

customer_reviews.title: Love Bear Paws
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sister for Christmas 🎄 and she loves them. She said her feet felt so warm. I’m debating on getting me another pair for myself. I have 3 pairs of Bear Paws. They last forever. This is a great price. It came in Bear Paw packaging so I’d say the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: MaryC

customer_reviews.title: Faulty top buttons, otherwise comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love bearpaw boots! I’ve been wearing them for the last 14 years. These are just as comfortable as ever, my complaint is about the price of “string” that holds the buttons. On both boots the top string broke. I’ve had boots like these before, where this wasn’t an issue. I’m not sure why they strings broke. Otherwise the boots are fine, just that small detail was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boots. Similar to any typical UGG like boot. They are comfortable and warm. They are a good price and good quality. I purchased a water repellent spray to use on them prior to wearing and they are doing good. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Runs SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Had to return...they run very small! Maybe if you wear them long enough to wear the thick fur lining down, they would fit better. But, they were too small to even be able to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boot ever!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They were difficult to pull on the first time but after that, no problem. I normally wear wide size shoes but these are extremely comfortable and I ordered my usual size 9. I hope they continue to make this boot as I will be ordering a new pair every year. I can't stress enough just how comfortable these boots are.....as a person with arthritis in my feet, comfortable footwear is hard to find. These are the best.
customer_reviews.author: donna kay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable shoes, fit to size
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I have bunions and shoe shopping can be a nightmare. I wear 7.5 womens so thats what i ordered and they fit perfectly. I would even dare to say the have ugg quality. Needless to say my new favorite shoes and i will be wearing them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Colie Bear

customer_reviews.title: Need more great boots like this style
customer_reviews.text: Based on the drop down selections I would like to clarify that I purchased a 10 when I wear a 9. I realize many people wear these type of boots without socks. I don't. I always purchase boots a size larger leaving room for socks and even added insoles. With that said they fit as expected. These type of boots don't come with arch supports.They are totally flat inside. I really like the color as I thought they would look nice with jeans. I like the Bearpaw brand because their products are less expensive than Emu and UGG. They also seem to have more varied styles than the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: J D

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality!
customer_reviews.text: I think you get good value for your money on this pair of boots. I also ordered a cheaper pair of similar boots just to run around in...the $30 cheaper pair you get what you pay for the $60 bearpaws you get real suede and a much more comfortable boot!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry E

customer_reviews.title: Great boots and very warm.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried with the hooks on the side that it would be difficult getting them on. I only have to slip my foot in, don't have to undo the clips and they are great. They're very warm and I've used a spray to waterproof them. And, I got a size larger in case I wanted to wear socks but they're so warm no socks are needed. I love them. And so much cheaper than Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Kate KenworthyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Like them, but toggles don't hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots - they're cute, comfy and warm, and doa good job of repelling water/snow once treated with the suede spray. But I've only had them two months, and already one of the toggles busted off. Luckily I saw it on the floor and was able to save it, and can hopefully sew it back on. I'm thinking of contacting Bearpaw direct to see what they can do otherwise. I'd have given them 5 stars were it not for that, because I really like them am would consider buying them again once these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Messina&Sons

customer_reviews.title: Love these real suede boots, but run small
customer_reviews.text: So thrilled with these boots that are so warm, look great and don't make my feet sweat in them. In a shoe I wear a 6 1/2 or 7. Happy that I ordered an 8. Order up a size for sure! Still need to order the water proofing spray, so I wear them more for the style rather than as a snow boot. Really like these boots!
customer_reviews.author: Nana Loves Summer!

customer_reviews.title: could wear all day!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying black fuzzy boots but after a couple wears the fuzzy goes away, I needed a good pair without paying all the $$$ like Uggs. Finally i decided on these. They are the most comfortable pair of fuzzy boots i have ever bought!! They keep you warm and dry even on a rainy day. I would wear them all day if I could. I bought a 6 and fit just right, but i'm normally a 5, so consider one size larger when you purchase these. I'm already considering a second pair in a different color. If the shoe fits, buy it in every color!
customer_reviews.author: Eneri L.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect!
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful. The fit is perfect, I usually wear a 9 or 9.5 shoe, these are 9.
customer_reviews.author: squirtmn

customer_reviews.title: ... white on the tops of Lester so it looks funny I'm soooooo disappointed n I paid 48 for poorly ...
customer_reviews.text: Boot are cut to short on the tops of boots so the black boots I ordered from b&h are white on the tops of Lester so it looks funny I'm soooooo disappointed n I paid 48 for poorly made boots
customer_reviews.author: Kathy martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tween; good for me
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore out her last pair of boots in a similar style, so I was happy to purchase these on Amazon because it was easy to find the size we needed and cheaper than in-store. My daughter loves the boots, and they are perfectly trendy for middle school. I ordered a similar boot and was happy that my larger calves didn't impede the fit. The arch support in all these kinds of boots is awful, but my daughter has young feet and can wear them all day. I, on the other hand, need a bit more arch support, so these aren't "all day" shoes, even though they are warm and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Broke within months
customer_reviews.text: The soles broke within like 1 month of having them. Bearpaws are becoming terrible boots and I don't even want to buy them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: christina gardella

customer_reviews.title: In truly dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of bearpaw boots that were obviously used. They had scuff marks and a few spots like water dots or something . There was a glove tip in the right boot? They didn't come with tags ,film over the boot nothing . I needed a pair of boots for a trip or I would have sent them back , will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: aandc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new pair of bearpaw’s because mine were looking really worn and dingy I love that I found these way cheaper than my local retailers they are the exact same ones that I already have cuz I love them so much these of course look so much better!!!! The only thing I didn’t like was how hey were folded in the box because it made a crease in the front but I put rounded cardboard on the inside with some bags to make it rounder and for the most part it fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Alei Strickler

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super soft. I loved it. I'm a size 6.5 to 7. Got a size 7. Fit perfrctly.
customer_reviews.author: SilverGold

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots ordered an 8 last year (8 being ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots ordered an 8 last year (8 being my normal shoe size) and after the fur matted down abit they became way too big. Foot coming out of them and all. So this time ordered a size 7 and they are a little snug at first but after a couple wears they will be the perfect fit. I've always been told anyway with bearpaws even uggs to go a size smaller because of when the fur goes down they feel bigger.
customer_reviews.author: raven wells

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for slippers really because my ankles were cold. They turned to be real leather and fleece! We've had a cold snap and they've really come in handy! They keep my feet toasty warm even with the thinnest socks. I usually wear a 7 1/2 and I got an 8, if they did come in a 7 1/2 I think that would have been to small.
customer_reviews.author: Deedra Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bear paw is a great bargain!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast. My boots were a bit too snug when I first wore them but they do loosen up the inside when you wear them a few times. I love how they keep me warm and dry. And I get great compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: kit1989

customer_reviews.title: these boots feel like slippers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I have a wide foot with a very high instep and have trouble finding any shoes other than athletic shoes that fit well and are comfortable. I wore a pair of these that belonged to my granddaughter and loved them and had to buy my own. They are lined with fur and are so so warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Quilt Lover

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love them I now have 4 pair all different colors and styles I don't wear socks with them never need to even in -0 temps my feet are always warm I took a pic of them next to another boot to show the height in comperasion
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wore these all the time...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a long time ago and they are a great pair of boots... I still have them and wear them all the time!! I highly recommend these cute functional boots! they are really warm too...
customer_reviews.author: ShannyB

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy a pair of uggs and my co-worker told me about bearpaws. I decided to try them and this is the best purchase I have made this year! It feels like I am walking on clouds and they keep my feet so warm. I wear a 8.5 and ordered size 9 since there weren't any half sizes. The size 9 fits great with a little bit of extra room. These boots feel just as good as the ugg boots if not better! I wore these for 9 hours and my feet felt great at the end of the day. I am going to buy another pair in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Msjonz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy boots
customer_reviews.text: I had these boots for years. Wore them in all weather, snow, rain, slush. They are very comfortable, they feel like you're wearing slippers. They are warm and weather resistant. The last pair I had lasted me for over 8 years. I just got a new pair and I'm just as pleased with this pair as the old ones. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Clingenpeel

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 8 as a gift for someone who always wears size 8. Not only was it way too small, she could not even pull it on past the curve to get her foot all the way into the boot. They looked great but the sizing is all wrong. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: dragonballz

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Positive: Have had these boots (my original order off of Amazon) since 2013. Just like any other shoe, they last if you take care of them. I have never waterproofed my shoes since purchasing them. Of course these are not "winter boots"- more of a cold weather (meaning no snow, no rain) kind of a boot that I wear in the fall. I also live in the Midwest so I understand when to wear a shoe like this. Fair warning: I have flat feet (hardly any arch) so of course these shoes are not healthy for extended wear if you have arch issues. Even with that being said, I will definitely be purchasing a black pair. Everything in moderation ;)
customer_reviews.author: PlutoBurst

customer_reviews.title: Decent Price with quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love! I had purchased a differeny/cheaper brand of the same style and I had to return as getting them on was such a struggle. These ones were tight at first(the tag says that's how it should be at frist,snug) now that I've worn them a few times they have stretched out and are perfect. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Cozy
customer_reviews.text: When I first got the boots I thought they felt a bit tight. You have to wear them awhile and break them in. Now they are snug, warm and comfortable. I don't even want to take them off! I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Tpena

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are a great “cheap” boot. They do not even compare to the comfort of Uggs. They’re great as long as when you purchase you aren’t expected a dupe for uggs.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Gallivan

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as my last Bearpaws...
customer_reviews.text: Last year, I ordered a great pair of bearpaw boots. They were sueded with fur lining and a tie up the back. GREAT BOOTS! Unfourtunately my dog loved the boots more than I did. I decided to get a new pair of bearpaws since they were less than half the price of UGGS and I got complimented on them every time I wore them. The Agibail boot actually has more of a fleece-like lining. After ONE WEAR the sheepskin lining began to fray and come apart from the leather. They now look extremely cheap. I am very unhappy. Regretting my purchace. Wish I could return them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks got new boots
customer_reviews.text: I love all 15 pairs of my old Bearpaws and would definitely rate them 5 stars. Unfortunately this new pair really doesn't fit correctly.The right one is to big and the left one is just right. I'm afraid to send them back, based on previous reviews who knows what I would get. I guess they'll be fine for sitting around the campfire this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Pleiku Mike

customer_reviews.title: Purchased second pair !
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased two pairs of these for my wife. She loves them. I didn’t know how to rate the fit as I do not wear them and each persons foot is different. And so is each shoemakers idea of the correct size and fit
customer_reviews.author: troy phillips

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are super comfy with the shearling lining and foam bottom as well. Boots are solidly constructed and weighty. The suede is a nice very dark brown almost black. I've owned many Bear Paw products over the years and they've never let me down
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: they broke..
customer_reviews.text: i don't normally write reviews but i'm pissed that i paid 50$ for these and they are already broken! i got them at the end of November and hadn't even worn them more than a handful of times and the top wood pieces broke off on both boots.. which is super unfortunate cause these are super comfortable and i hadn't even had them for a month! i don't know if they were defective or what but i wouldn't buy another pair if this is the case!
customer_reviews.author: Mj

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They are so warm and so comfortable. I had a pair for almost 5 years and they held up nicely. They probably would have lasted a lot longer if it wasn't for my dog deciding they'd make a nice chew toy. There was no doubt in my mind that I'd get another pair. I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: adorri

customer_reviews.title: Great boot.
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot. My teenage granddaughter wanted me to get them. I normally don’t wear any boots because they can be difficult to put on. But the older I get, the more cautious I become with the snow and ice. So many styles look like they belong to my grandmother. These slip on. They’re comfortable and stylish. Who says you can’t learn from your kids and grandkids?
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and love the olive color.
customer_reviews.text: Color looks exactly like the picture. I wear between a 81/2 and 9M , and decided to go a 9M. They fit great and have room for thick socks. Two buttons on side are not just for looks, but do open. I live in the snow and travel all over the US and Canada daily, and think these will do wonderful in the snow, and ice. They are about 11 1/2 inches from top to bottom (width of a normal envelope).
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice slide in boot, I always buy boots bigger so I can wear heavy socks in them. I have a wide foot, it fit perfect. Nice and warm. Fur lined all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Snowflake

customer_reviews.title: Sheep for your feet
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, very soft and warm and fluffy inside. Feels like I am wearing sheep on my feet. Ahhh so cozy. I didn't pretreat it with that snow and ice repellent because I didn't wanna buy it, and they ended up still looking like new months later. A little dirty but I'm not a shoe snob. I like my shoes to be shoes not decoration. Anyway so worth it
customer_reviews.author: Darkness Creature

customer_reviews.title: A great boot at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I owned another pair of BearPaw boots and wear them all the time. I wanted the same quality and for I had already experienced so I was glad to see these marked down. The leather is top quality, the fleece and padding are soft and comfortable to my wide feet and normally cramped toes. Would wear them all winter long if I could
customer_reviews.author: mdelafield

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make these better was if they were coated with NeverWet. Otherwise, these are warm and comfortable boots and I love the green color.
customer_reviews.author: Mercy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Look great.
customer_reviews.text: Look nice, good construction..so far so good. Ordered these for my Granddaughter, she is very pleased. I didn't realize I had ordered the green color, but she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Adolph

customer_reviews.title: Dream Paris was a much better purchase and brand
customer_reviews.text: Had to return these because the left and right boot fit differently, and the size was way off, they were too large. Dream Paris was a much better purchase and brand. I wear between an 8 1/2 and a 9, depending on the shoe (high heel, tennis shoe, lifter, etc.) but I would have wanted to order an 8 for these, but they were sold out in my size at the price and color I wanted. I was not paid for this review.
customer_reviews.author: MomOf4under5

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved the style and fit but barely a month into wearing the top buttons on both feet fell off. Never had a problem like this with the more expensive brand but I guess that’s the quality you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hart

customer_reviews.title: warm
customer_reviews.text: did run a little big. usually wear 9.5 with heavy socks. got the 9 wearing heavy socks and fit perfectly. very warm. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: bunny

customer_reviews.title: Lovely boot but watch out for the toggles.
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot. It was exactly what my daughter wanted. She's about a 7 but I ordered an 8 so her boots and thick socks could fit in. I do have one complaint that the toggles are just attached with a single knot (not even double knotted) so one fell off the second time she wore them. We were able to reattach it but it took some work and required locking pliers. We went and double knotted all the other ties to hopefully prevent this from happening but beware and make sure yours are attached securely before you lose one without noticing.
customer_reviews.author: lizap

customer_reviews.title: Luv'em!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I try hard to not get them dirty as we live on a farm and my 3 GSD's think it is fun to step on my feet. I forget that I have them on when I go out and should change into my mud boots. They do clean up easily, thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: YogaEnergyTherapy

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the side buttons!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my daughter for Christmas. She loved them! Comfortable, cute, & the sizing was perfect. But, less than two months later, without extensive wear, one of the side buttons popped off, making these practically new boots unusable. The button size/shape is pretty unusual, so I'm not sure if I can find a replacement (never mind how I would I sew a button through thick suede shearling?!). Super disappointed because these seemed so wonderful at first, but I think the quality might be questionable.
customer_reviews.author: adeutschler

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!! So warm!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these!! They are a great alternative to UGGS and the best part is they don't coast as much!! They are so comfortable and warm. great quality and super cute! I also have a pair in tan. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great look, may run a smidge tight
customer_reviews.text: Love this boot! I've received many compliments on it & it is sooo warm & cozy! The only issue I have is that it's a bit tight compared to the other 4 pair of BearPaw boots I have, which have all run perfectly on-size from the start. I would heartily recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected and the packaging and everything was perfect. Came in a legit bearpaw shoe box and all of the tags still on. Packaged really well. I ordered this for my mok and she loves it. Ready for the winter season!
customer_reviews.author: Chichi

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I love these boots, they are made of high quality material and are extremely soft and comfortable. They keep my feet warm and water doesn't soak through them (granite I put water resistant spray on them, so that may be why!). For 38$, this item is totally worth it. I know I got an insane deal... The next day I bought them they went back up to 76$. I am so glad I made the decision to buy these, I would definitely recommend! Heck, I like them better than my Ugg boots... That's just my personal opinion though!! (Bearpaw sounds better than Ugg anyway lol...)
customer_reviews.author: JMarie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time in the box with all original documents. I love the color of these boots, the fit was perfect
customer_reviews.author: VI Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Not sure they were real...
customer_reviews.text: Order a new pair every year. Very disappointed this year. Not sure they’re real. Had them for 2 months weren’t even worn much and there was a huge 2.5 inch hole that blew out on the side of the boot where the Suede meets the rubber sole like it was glued crappy. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love bearpaw
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and nice looking, just need to go up one size, especially with socks. Unfortunately, they didn't have a 12 so had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Life in PNW

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can just step into them without bending ...
customer_reviews.text: Actally, I don't know if I could wear these all day because I never have occasion to do so--they're too bulky for work, and it doesn't usually get cold enough here to need them all day. I mainly use them for walking the dog on cold mornings. I love that I can just step into them without bending over to pull them on (I purposely bought a size just a little bit big), and they are toasty warm and cozy. I have them in 2 colors now.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Wife’s second pair and she loves them. The first pair held up 4-5 years before the rubber sole split.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Liebold

customer_reviews.title: order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Because of the sheep fleece inside you need to order a size larger, but I love these boots, super warm
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jensen

customer_reviews.title: WARM AND COZY!  LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots just as much as the other two pairs of Bearpaws that I bought this winter. All of my Bearpaw boots fit as well as my UGGs, are just as warm, and are a whole lot cheaper! The only odd thing about this pair was that when I sprayed them with the usual waterproofing spray, this pair looks significantly darker than they did before I sprayed them, which was not the case with either the navy pair or the cranberry pair that I bought. They don't look bad, just darker, but it does seem peculiar.
customer_reviews.author: koty

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent sizing for different colors
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5, i got these in size11 because last time I got the dark grey with dark grey fur in size 10 and they fit small but now these in 11 are too big. I kept them,but they are a little floppy
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after my favorite style of EMU boots were discontinued this year - rather than price up to UGGs I decided to give slightly lower priced Bearpaw a try. They are sized small - I usually wear 6 1/2 or 7 and needed an 8 - the 7 was tight in the arch across the top of my foot. The 8s are a big roomy in the toe but I would still recommend sizing up. They could use a little more support in the sole, but otherwise they are quite comfortable, very warm and I have gotten lots of compliments. I am satisfied with my purchase, and will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: beb

customer_reviews.title: I Absolutely Love These Cute Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! This is my first pair and after reading several reviews and trying all types of similar boots on in stores I had to buy these. I wear a 5.5 and have narrow feet, I purchased a 5 and they fit fabulously, normally I don't go down a half size when buying shoes unless they are open toed, so maybe these run slightly big. They are super soft, super comfy and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bearpaw boots
customer_reviews.text: I did order the size larger than I normally wear after reading other reviews. The boots are really nice they are comfortable and they look like they will be warm. I have not yet worn them I did try them on. I could have ordered my regular size. I have issues with my feet swelling so I ordered the next size. For those that are wondering if you want extra room for say warm socks then go ahead and get a size larger but I think they run pretty much to size. Really like them. I hope they stand up to the Winter!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad traction no protection
customer_reviews.text: Winter walking around in snow etc.Extremely dangerous bottoms, has no traction in Ice Storms. Slipped and fell numerous times. Would like a refund😩
customer_reviews.author: J.E.

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter! She absolutely loves them. The color is great and she says they keep her feet warm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Miria

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these!! Fits true to size and are so soft inside and are so comfortable! Durable and look so cute too. I can’t say enough great things about them. If you’re going back and forth about whether to get these....get them! :)
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and warm
customer_reviews.text: Wife bout these multiple times. For herself and as gifts. She really likes them. Comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: C.H

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and warm!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter as a gift. She just loves them. They are a true fit for size. The inside is very soft but I am not sure if it is real fur, acrylic or a blend. The outside seems like genuine suede and is a soft beautiful gray. They are very warm. The sole seems pretty slip proof. I own a few pairs of these in different colors (winter blue and pom berry) and they have a different inside lining that is real wool. I always use a few coatings of the waterproofing spray on all my sheepskin suede boots and it really helps keep them looking nice.
customer_reviews.author: flgardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boot for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love Bearpaw Boots & own several pairs/styles. Great quality & comfortable on my problem feet. I have bunions & plantar fasciitis, so it’s hard for me to get this kind of comfort in a boot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. I always buy bear paw boots. They are always of great quality. These boots are comfortable and easy to put on and pull off.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Moy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but.....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get some boots for warmth. I got them. They are nice looking too. They certainly aren't fancy but they still are very nice. Here's what I didn't like. They have NO traction. I take my dog for a walk. I shovel. I walk to my car. I walk across parking lots. There is nothing on the bottom to grip. I slip on ice. I slip on snow. It's a no-go for gription. Don't like it. That's why I gave it 3 stars. Would easily be a 5 if there was traction on the bottom. Bummer. :(
customer_reviews.author: just a simple woman

product_meta.title: BEARPAW Women's Abigail Fashion Boot
product_meta.description:
8 inch double toggle boot

Bearpaw footwear combines comfort and contemporary style. Their footwear is made from quality materials that provide a natural beauty that's wearable year round.
feature_bullets: two toggle buttons open on the outside of the ankle
Sheepskin and wool blend lining, Woven heel logo
Classic low profileTPR rubber wedge outsole
Order 1 size up, see size chart for details
